item.title: Join Prabhat
item.description: Bharatanatyam Dance - This will have a different a/c number and IFSC Kathak Dance - This will have a different a/c number and IFSC Karnatic Music - This will have a different a/c number and IFSC As soon as the payment is made, the payee should get a receipt acknowledgement via email and mobile As soon as the amounted is transferred to our accounts, we need to get an acknowledgement receipt via email and mobile.
